reason: The text suggests a difficult and potentially harmful home environment, with feelings of being trapped and losing oneself. While it doesn't explicitly mention harm, the phrases 'walking on eggshells' and 'need to find a way out' suggest a possible risk of harm to self or others depending on the specific situation, therefore escalation of the situation is possible.

title: User Story: Overdose
content: Just saw a story about another OD. Makes me sick. Lost a friend last year. If you're struggling, please reach out. There are people who care. You're not alone. ❤️

title: User Story: Suicide

title: User Story: Suicide
content:

"Things feel really heavy lately.  Having some dark thoughts.  Trying to reach out instead of isolating. Anyone else been there?  How did you cope?"
